description.english: Created a character.
Too easy... right!?
Great, I've got sand in my paws.
Don't worry, gravity is back to normal.
Sliding into the next world.
You are too hot to handle!
Everybody has to start somewhere right?
Respectable to say the least...
Congrats, you are officially rich!
Time for your first gem upgrade.
You're going to need the next gem upgrade.
Moving up the food chain now.
The long awaited gun upgrade can be yours.
Woah! That's 50, time for the magnet upgrade!
You found me, thanks for playing my game!
Survive until the last statue awakes.
Unlocked the fluffy combat pet, shoot to activate.
Unlocked the chilly combat pet, shoot to activate.
You didn't really have a way to exit, but thanks!
Reach the maximum coin multiplier upgrade.
Reach the maximum fire rate upgrade.
Reach the maximum player speed upgrade.
Reach the maximum projectile size upgrade.
Reach the maximum projectile quantity upgrade.
No problem, just got to try again.
Maybe take a little breather and make a drink.
Focus young one, plenty more threats ahead.
Sorry to tell you, but you are doing something wrong.
Most players will get this achievement in the minigames.
Beat the score of 15,000 on the coconut catch minigame.
Beat a score of 10,000 on the ice climb minigame.
Beat a score of 5,000 on the long road minigame.
Beat a score of 25,000 on the endless horde minigame.
Beat a score of 12,500 on the jumpy cat minigame.
Congrats, you have completed 10 levels!
That's 25 levels completed now, good going!
Holy moly, 50 levels completed!
You're crushing it, that's 100 levels completed!
Aww its a lil baby fleshling... whatever that is!
What's that!? A toxic lasher!
Upgraded to the best pet, the Imp Lord!
Beat a score of 15,000 on the death platform minigame.
Beat a score of 30,000 on the maze gunner minigame.
Beat a score of 20,000 on the bounce blitz minigame.
Found the exit and (presumably) doubled your score! Lets go!
Only to top 1% can get this achievement! Congrats!
That's all of them! Final upgrade time!
Tested the game while we were making improvements! Thank you!
Isn't this an old movie reference?
You found the secret cult location!
This is halloween, halloween, halloween!
Just taking a little break!
Completed a level without slaying a monster!
You found CJ within the death platform minigame!
You found Enszai within the jumpy cat minigame!
You found Incredz hidden within World 1!
You found Nana hidden within World 2!
You found Ketbaron hidden within World 3!
You found Axomari hidden within World 4!

Now your wheat won't spoil... great!
Now your carrots won't spoil... crunchy!
Now your turnips won't spoil... awesome!
Now your potatoes won't spoil... earthy!
Now your sweet potatoes won't spoil... sweet!
Now your lemons won't spoil... zesty!
Now your limes won't spoil... cool!
Now your pumpkins won't spoil... spooky!
Now your watermelons won't spoil... juicy!
Well you ruined that crop didn't you!
Fully upgraded the farmhouse building, check them bonuses!
Fully upgraded the silo building, check them bonuses!
Now it's time to collect some critters!
Welcome to the straw hat club!

You've collected the tumbler critter for your farm!

You've collected the penguin critter for your farm!
You've collected the lava snail critter for your farm!

Running around like a headless chicken!
Farmer by day, cow saviour by night!
Just keep rolling, rolling, rolling... what?
Dusted them gazelle, nice!
Keep on working, great job!
Customized your farm to match your personality!
